tool.name: Potential Annual Insolation
tool.description: Calculates the annual potential total insolation for given time steps and stores resulting time series in a grid collection.

param.name: STEPS
param.label: Number of Steps
param.help: Number of time steps per year.

param.name: HOUR_STEP
param.label: Resolution [h]
param.help: Time step size for a day's calculation given in hours.
